content:
Okay, I see the layout. My avatar 'a' is at (7,1). There are boxes '@' scattered around the map. There are also monsters '#'. My goal is to collect the boxes, I presume, while avoiding the monsters. The most immediate box is at (2,10), (2,16), (2,24), (12,10), (12,16), (12,24). There is a monster '#' at (1,5) above me, (2,3) nearby, (3,6) above, (4,4) further above.

I will move right to avoid the monster above and start navigating towards the closest box on row 2.
Action: 2

The avatar is at (7,2). There are monsters nearby at (1,5), (2,3), (3,3), (4,3), (5,3), (6,3), (8,4), and (11,1). There are boxes at (2,10), (2,16), (2,24), (12,10), (12,16), and (12,24).
My strategy is to move away from the monsters first.
I can move right to (7,3).
Action: 2
I expect to move to (7,3).
